transcript:
- [Narrator] Five signs
that your mental state
might be shifting.
Number one, you experience apathy.
Apathy is a persistent lack of passion.
It can cause you to feel
disinterested in meeting new people
or trying new things.
Number two, you experience dissociation.
Dissociation takes on many
forms, such as derealization,
depersonalization and
dissociative amnesia.
Number three, you withdraw
from your friends and family.
You actively avoid
meeting family or friends
because you no longer
feel like seeing them.
Number four, you experience mood changes.
You may feel more sensitive,
irritable, or critical.
Number five, you've developed
unhealthy behaviors.
Mental strain or distress
can cause you to behave
differently or out of character.
For example, frequently skipping meals
or engaging in self harm can
cause us to be more agitated,
engage in risky activities
or behave erratically.
Do you relate to any of these signs?
